conbody.p: The user us presented with a login window ( ) every time IdlLAB is run in advanced mode. Access to the system is only possible upon entering valid credentials - name and password.

Each teacher has their own personal folder that stores all the files pertaining to this account: class files, recordings, log books, etc. The name of this folder is the same as the teacher's login name.
conbody.note: A default Admin account with Admin password (case sensitive) is created during IdlLAB installation.
It is imperative to change the default Admin password on your first login into the system. Failure to do so will put your classroom into an extremely vulnerable position for computer intrusion.
conbody.p: Teacher accounts can be switched during an active session. Select Account tab and press Change button to switch the accounts. A login window will appear on your screen ( ).
Select Account tab and press Add button to add a new teacher account. An Add teacher account window will appear on your screen ( ), where you can specify name and password for the new account.
Select Account tab and press Delete button to remove a teacher account. A Delete teacher account window will appear on your screen ( ) where you can choose the account to be removed from the system.
conbody.note: Adding and removing teacher accounts is only possible when logged in with Admin credentials.
conbody.p: The teachers are able to change their own passwords. Select Account and press Edit button. Change password window will appear on your screen ( ) where you can specify a new password after confirming the old one. Press OK to save changes.
conbody.note: Select Account tab and press Open folder button to display contents of the teacher folder.
